definition.text: The branch Plugins-Docs is used by contributors of Plugins, documentations or tutorials. This branch in syncronized with Develop and Master everytime a new version is released, and it's purpose is to allow the flow of docs pages, plugins and tutorials into the master branch at a higher rate than changes at the codebase done at the Develop branch. This means that the Master branch might have many updates in between releases.

paragraphs.text: Contributors working at this branch coordinate their here:
